tricks.description: whether the game is played in tricks

turns.description: whether the game is player in turns

shared_zones.description: an enumeration of any global card zones: each of these zones is created only the specified number of times, and are not duplicated depending on the player count

player_zones.description: an enumaration of player-specific zones: a copy of each of these zones is create for each player in the game

decks.description: an enumeration and labelling of the decks which will be used in the game

name.description: the name which is used within this object to refer to this deck

source.description: path to a source deck file

each_player.description: whether a copy of this deck should be created for each player in the game

aces_high.description: in games where card values can be assigned and well ordered, should aces/ones be considered high or low

players.description: the number of players that the game accomodates
